sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.INVTY_LOC_CD AS INVTY_LOC_CD ,A.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,A.ROP_QTY AS ROP_QTY FROM MRP_INFO A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.LOC_ROLE_TP_CD = #locRoleTpCd# AND A.MRP_ENBL_FLG = #mrpEnblFlg# AND A.MRP_INFO_RGTN_STS_CD = #mrpInfoRgtnStsCd# AND A.RTL_SWH_CD = #rtlSwhCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY A.INVTY_LOC_CD , A.MDSE_CD
